title: Tisu.com To Host Merchant Fair
text:
17:39 CET Tisu.com To Host Merchant Fair By Daily Guide 
Some items on display at the Tisu.com.gh pick-up store at its East Legon office 
Ghana's premier and most trusted online discount store, tisu.com.gh has introduced the first eCommerce fair dubbed, Tisu Marketplace. 
Following the recent successful launch of Ghana's first online Pick-Up Store, tisu.com.gh is now inviting the general public to the country's first eCommerce fair. 
Various merchants from the Tema and Accra areas will display their products at the event which would be held on Saturday between 12 noon and 6pm at its East Legon office. 
In addition to great shopping, there will be entertainment such as riding of Ghana's only Mechanical Bull, food, music and discounts of up to 75 percent. 
The family event is set to bring Accra's top merchants and shoppers together. 
Customers can meet their favourite customer service representative, chat with vendors and test products and the online shopping experience altogether. 
The Tisu Marketplace complements the online shopping experience that customers have enjoyed with tisu.com.gh since 2011. Tisu.com.gh has been offering amazing daily discounts with free delivery within Accra, Tema and now Kumasi. 
According to Tisu Merchant, Jemima Ashietey who deals in jewelry, 'The Tisu Marketplace gives us the opportunity to physically interact with and appreciate those who patronize our products. As a merchant on the website, we never get to personally meet them so I believe this is a great platform not only to do so but introduce them to other products we may have. With special discounts on this day only, who would want to miss out?' 
According to her, the event will give her the chance to meet other merchants. 
At Tisu, there are top quality brands and discounts of up to 75 percent on items such as fashion, electronics, leisure, home & living, restaurants and travel deals.
